statements: UPDATE wine_preferences SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE wine_preferences SET wine_ratings = '{"Chardonnay": 4, "Merlot": 3}' WHERE customer_id = '543e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005';

UPDATE wine_preferences SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', past_purchases = '[{"wine": "Cabernet Sauvignon", "year": 2018}]' WHERE customer_id = '1c34c027-5a8d-4a8b-a619-6d198e8f7d1f';
UPDATE wine_preferences SET email = 'jane.smith@example.com', wine_ratings = '[{"wine": "Chardonnay", "rating": 4.5}]', name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE customer_id = 'f148ba24-9901-4ad6-832b-9d0cb068c61d';
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_1 = 'Red Wine', preference_2 = 'White Wine', preference_3 = 'Rose Wine' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_1 = 'Merlot', preference_2 = 'Chardonnay', preference_3 = 'Sauvignon Blanc' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_1 = 'Dry', preference_2 = 'Sweet' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE wine_ratings SET rating_value = 4.5 WHERE customer_id = 101 AND wine_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET wine_preference='Red Wine' WHERE customer_id=101;
UPDATE past_purchases SET quantity=3, wine_bottle_id=105 WHERE purchase_id=201;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET wine_preference = 'Red Wine', food_preference = 'Italian' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE wine_ratings SET rating = 4.5, review = 'Excellent wine!' WHERE customer_id = 201 AND wine_bottle_id = 301;
UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount=50.00, purchase_date='2021-10-10' WHERE purchase_id=100;
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 100.50, purchase_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE purchase_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET total_amount = 150.00, quantity = 3 WHERE customer_id = 2 AND purchase_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET customer_age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET preferred_wine_type = 'Red' , preferred_region = 'Napa Valley' WHERE customer_id = 2;
